biotools.summary: The purpose of this pipeline is to handle beginning-to-end metatranscriptome analysis.  Starting with a raw sequenced file in fastq format, it performs cleaning and removal of adaptor contamination, and then aligns paired-end files (if specified).

bioschemas.name: SAMSA
bioschemas.summary: The purpose of this pipeline is to handle beginning-to-end metatranscriptome analysis.  Starting with a raw sequenced file in fastq format, it performs cleaning and removal of adaptor contamination, and then aligns paired-end files (if specified).
